overview: Vihtori Frankenström dies after overdosing on cocaine. His pals Teemu and Aleksi get scared and take Frankenström's body to their pal Aapo Lovecraf, who apparently knows how to resurrect the dead. Frankenström resurrects from the dead, but he seems to have become a homicidal maniac. Frankenström starts a bloody rampage through the neighborhood.
title: Frankenström
